title: The Fire Between Us
lyrics:
The memories of life we see
We find a reason
To realize together
Tomorrow holds another day
We look for answers

We will fight to rise



Your time is over

Follow my truth

That the world is ending

Feel the lies through

Your leaders hands



Follow me, the time has come

Weâ€™ll change the world from the light

I will guide you there



Trust in the faction

Follow my path

The fire between us

Call onto the world above
